name: April Bradford
summary: Forward-thinking professional with experience in human resources, sales, customer service and education, offering excellent communication and computer skills; highly organized and meticulous.

experience.title: HR Contact Center Specialist
experience.description: Answer and resolve employee and people-manager issues, provide guidance on HR responsibilities (year-end compensation, mid-year and year-end processes, resource planning), guidance on data changes (new hires, transfers, terminations, retiring), and administration of employee programs (Service recognition, PTO/Vacation entitlement, time administration). Maintain adherence to audit/compliance and regulatory requirements. Provide support on HR policies, processes, and procedures including benefits and payroll transactions, people-manager responsibilities and HR systems. Participated in new hire training, women in leadership initiatives, and initiatives to improve colleagues' metrics and call quality.

experience.title: Admissions Representative
experience.description: Conduct face-to-face or telephone interviews and email correspondence to identify high school and adult student prospects, mentor students through the admissions process, ensure compliance with company policies and laws, and participate in school retention efforts by maintaining contact with active students through graduation.

experience.title: Recruiting Coordinator
experience.description: Conserve database for storage and retrieval of assessments; coordinate job fairs; on-site coordination of interview activity; run e-verifies and uphold payroll information; track applicant flow; manage payroll records and changes; perform background checks and other duties to support the team; maintain filing systems and other administrative tasks.

experience.title: Branch Coordinator
experience.description: Maintain front desk operations; track and monitor branch applicant flow; weekly data entry of applications; manage office traffic; answer and screen calls; coordinate interview activity; manage payroll-related data changes and confidential information; perform filing and other duties as required.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Communication (Mass Communication)
